go_data.justification: PCT1 is the rate-limiting enzyme in the phosphatidylcholine synthesis pathway.
PCT1 is the rate-limiting enzyme in the phosphatidylcholine synthesis pathway.
PCT1 is aligned with the amino acid sequence of the most studied phosphocholine cytidylyltransferase protein in yeast.
Deltapct1 strain is sensitive to heat shock stress and overexpression of POF1 was able to reverse this sensitivity.
PCT1 is involved in the phosphatidylcholine synthesis pathway, which is a major membrane lipid component.
